complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Next.js Project Setup with App Router and Core Dependencies
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Foundation setup task with well-documented steps. Complexity comes from coordinating multiple dependencies and ensuring compatibility. Current subtask breakdown is appropriate covering project init, TailwindCSS/ShadCN setup, folder structure, state management, and Next.js configuration.

Moderate complexity involving Prisma ORM setup, complex schema design with relationships, and data seeding. Current subtask breakdown covers all necessary steps from Prisma installation to migrations and seed data.

High complexity due to security considerations, session management, and integration with database. Needs expansion into: NextAuth.js installation, User model creation, auth pages, middleware setup, JWT configuration, and profile management.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: PDF.js Integration and Single PDF Viewer
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving PDF.js integration, canvas rendering, performance optimization for large files, and error handling. Should be expanded into: PDF.js installation, canvas renderer, zoom controls, navigation, error handling, and performance optimization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Paper Upload and S3 Storage System
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving cloud storage integration, file validation, security considerations, and CDN setup. Needs expansion into: S3 setup, upload API, drag-drop UI, validation, security scanning, metadata storage, and CDN configuration.

High complexity due to responsive layout management, state synchronization between viewers, and complex UI interactions. Should expand into: layout design, resizable panels, viewer container, state management, and error boundaries.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Sidebar Management System with Paper Lists
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving responsive design, drag-drop functionality, filtering, and state management. Should expand into: sidebar component, paper list, search/filter, drag-drop, and status management.

Very high complexity involving NLP, pattern matching, database resolution, and complex UI interactions. Should expand into: citation extraction, regex patterns, reference resolution, bidirectional linking, preview components, database matching, and interaction handlers.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Learning Path System and Progress Tracking
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving recommendation algorithms, progress tracking, path validation, and complex data relationships. Should expand into: path manager component, recommendation engine, progress tracking, prerequisite logic, path builder, and visualization.

Very high complexity involving D3.js integration, graph algorithms, performance optimization, and complex data visualization. Should expand into: D3.js setup, force-directed layout, interactive controls, clustering algorithms, performance optimization, and tooltip system.
